import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import '../styles/Sidebar.css' import nebulaLogo from '../assets/nebula-logo.svg' import homeIcon from '../assets/home-icon.svg' import exploringIcon from '../assets/exploring-icon.svg' import wishlistIcon from '../assets/wishlist-icon.svg' import cartIcon from '../assets/cart-icon.svg' import profileIcon from '../assets/profile-icon.svg' import purchaseHistoryIcon from '../assets/purchase-history-icon.svg' import settingsIcon from '../assets/settings-icon.svg' function Sidebar() { const menuItems = [ { label: "Home", icon: homeIcon }, { label: "Exploring", icon: exploringIcon }, { label: "Wishlist", icon: wishlistIcon }, { label: "Cart", icon: cartIcon }, { label: "Profile", icon: profileIcon }, { label: "Purchase History", icon: purchaseHistoryIcon }, { label: "Settings", icon: settingsIcon }, ]; return (
{ menuItems.map((item, index) => (
  • {item.label}
    • )) }
    LOGIN
    ); } export default Sidebar;
